{"id":1521501052,"question_id":3699,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1737927077,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"636 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1521501052/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Special Subsequences","memory":"94.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long numberOfSubsequences(vector<int>& nums) {\n        //indices (p, q, r, s)\n        //nums[p] * nums[r] == nums[q] * nums[s]\n        // nums[p]/nums[q] == nums[s]/nums[r]\n        long long ret = 0;\n        int  n = nums.size();\n        unordered_map<double, int> cnt;\n        for(int r=4; r<n-2; r++) {\n            int q = r-2;\n            for(int p=0; p<q-1; p++) \n                cnt[ 1.0* nums[p]/nums[q] ]++;\n            for(int s=r+2; s<n; s++)\n                ret += cnt[1.0*nums[s]/nums[r]];\n        }\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-special-subsequences","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
